publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7771 John Swinney: Budget (Scotland) (No.5) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) (No.5) Bill and, in doing so, notes the Finance Committee’s 2nd Report, 2011 (Session 3): Report on Scotland’s Spending Plans and Draft Budget 2011-12. Supported by: Alex Salmond*, Bruce Crawford*
